TextView.android:text: Welcome to the Global Operations Conference 2018!

The Tauber Institute for Global Operations hosts the must attend operations event of the year — Taubers’ Global Operations Conference, GOC. 

The combination of global leaders in industry with top-ranked business and engineering faculty, GOC reflects the unparalleled resources the Tauber Institute offers today and symbolizes our unwavering commitment to the next generation of Operations leaders.

Here’s what a past attendee had to say:
 “The Tauber Global Operations Conference was a great experience to expand my understanding of how recent business and technology trends are impacting the operations and strategy of several major global companies. Also, it was a unique opportunity to expand my network and meet a very diverse and talented group of professionals that work across a wide range of global companies and industries.” - Jose Gomez, UCLA

Experience two days where you will:
• Learn from award winning faculty from the College of Engineering and the Stephen M. Ross School of Business as well as leading experts in operations today.
• Discover forward-thinking panels discussing real world strategies implemented to transform operations.
• Hear dynamic speakers + respected industry experts.
• Network with leading + emerging operations leaders
